sqlMap.select:
select * from ( select t.*,instr(t.ywurl,'http://') as bool from sys_message t where sfck='0' and ((t.jsrdm = #sysMessage.jsrdm# and t.jslx = '0') or (t.jsrssdwdm = #sysMessage.jsrssdwdm# and t.jslx = '1'))
t.xxlb =#sysMessage.xxlb#
(t.xxlb = '2' OR t.xxlb = '5' OR t.xxlb = '6' OR t.xxlb = '7')
(t.xxlb = '3' OR t.xxlb = '4')
(t.xxlb = '9')
order by sfck,fssj desc ) t where rownum <=8
sqlMap.update: update sys_message set sfck='1', cksj=#cksj# where ID = #id#
update sys_message set sfck='1', cksj=#cksj# where ywurl like '$ywurl$%'

UPDATE SYS_MESSAGE
XXNR = #xxnr#
YWURL = #ywurl#
JSRSSDW = #jsrssdw#
JSRSSDWDM = #jsrssdwdm#
FSR = #fsr#
FSRDM = #fsrdm#
FSSJ = #fssj#
FSRSSDW = #fsrssdw#
FSRSSDWDM = #fsrssdwdm#
SFCK = #sfck#
WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from sys_message t where ((t.jsrdm = #sysMessage.jsrdm# and t.jslx = '0') or (t.jsrssdwdm = #sysMessage.jsrssdwdm# and t.jslx = '1'))
t.xxlb =#sysMessage.xxlb#
(t.xxlb = '2' OR t.xxlb = '5')
(t.xxlb = '3' OR t.xxlb = '4')
t.xxbt like '%$sysMessage.xxbt$%'
t.xxnr like '%$sysMessage.xxnr$%'
t.sfck =#sysMessage.sfck#
t.fsr like '%$sysMessage.fsr$%'
fssj >= #sysMessage.fssj#
fssj <= #sysMessage.cksj#

select p.*,instr(p.ywurl,'http://') as bool from ( select rownum r ,m.* from ( select * from sys_message t where ((t.jsrdm = #sysMessage.jsrdm# and t.jslx = '0') or (t.jsrssdwdm = #sysMessage.jsrssdwdm# and t.jslx = '1'))
t.xxlb =#sysMessage.xxlb#
(t.xxlb = '2' OR t.xxlb = '5')
(t.xxlb = '3' OR t.xxlb = '4')
t.xxbt like '%$sysMessage.xxbt$%'
t.xxnr like '%$sysMessage.xxnr$%'
t.sfck =#sysMessage.sfck#
t.fsr like '%$sysMessage.fsr$%'
fssj >= #sysMessage.fssj#
fssj <= #sysMessage.cksj#
order by $sort$ $order$) m where rownum <= #end# )p where r > #begin#
select * from sys_message t where ID = #id#

select ROWNO from (select t.*,rownum as ROWNO from (select ID from SYS_MESSAGE where ((jsrdm = #jsrdm# and jslx = '0') or (jsrssdwdm = #jsrssdwdm# and jslx = '1')) order by sfck,fssj desc) t) where id=#id#

select ID from (select t.*,rownum as ROWNO from (select ID from SYS_MESSAGE where ((jsrdm = #jsrdm# and jslx = '0') or (jsrssdwdm = #jsrssdwdm# and jslx = '1')) order by sfck,fssj desc) t) where ROWNO=#rowno#
select a.* from dw_dwjbxxb a, dw_cyryxxb b where a.id=b.dwid and b.ryid=#ryid# AND a.XT_ZXBZ='0' and b.xt_zxbz='0'
select a.* from dw_dwjbxxb a where a.id=#id# AND a.XT_ZXBZ='0'
SELECT * FROM dw_cyryxxb WHERE RYID=#ryid# AND XT_ZXBZ='0'
SELECT * FROM dw_cyryxxb WHERE RYID=#ryid# and dwid=#dwid# AND XT_ZXBZ='0'
SELECT * FROM org_organization WHERE orgcode=#orgcode# AND XT_ZXBZ='0'
select * from bzdz_bzdzxxb t1 left join org_organization t2 on t1.zrqdm = t2.orgcode left join org_org_user t3 on t1.zrqdm = t3.orgid where t1.dzdm = #dzid#

select t1.id, t1.dwmc, t1.glbmid, t2.orgcode glfxjid, t2.orgname glfxjname, t3.orgcode glpcsid, t3.orgname glpcsname from dw_dwjbxxb t1 left join org_organization t2 on t1.glfxjid = t2.orgcode left join org_organization t3 on t1.glpcsid = t3.orgcode where t1.id = #dwid#
sqlMap.insert: insert into SYS_MESSAGE (ID,XXNR,XXLB,YWURL,FSR,FSRDM,FSSJ,FSRSSDW,FSRSSDWDM,DXZT,JSLX,JSR,JSRDM,JSRSSDW,JSRSSDWDM,SFCK,CKSJ,XXBT,DKFS) select SEQ_PK.NEXTVAL as ID,#sysMessage.xxnr# as XXNR,#sysMessage.xxlb# as XXLB,decode(#sysMessage.ywurl#,null,null,#sysMessage.ywurl# || SEQ_PK.CURRVAL) as YWURL, #sysMessage.fsr# as FSR,#sysMessage.fsrdm# as FSRDM,#sysMessage.fssj# as FSSJ,#sysMessage.fsrssdw# as FSRSSDW, #sysMessage.fsrssdwdm# as FSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.dxzt# as DXZT,#sysMessage.jslx# as JSLX, a.USERNAME as JSR,a.USERID as JSRDM, a.ORGNAME as JSRSSDW,a.ORGCODE as JSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.sfck# as SFCK,#sysMessage.cksj# as CKSJ,#sysMessage.xxbt# as XXBT,#sysMessage.dkfs# as DKFS from (select distinct a.ORGCODE,a.ORGNAME,c.USERID,c.USERNAME from ORG_ORGANIZATION a,ORG_ORG_USER b,ORG_USER c where a.ORGCODE in ($orgCodeCondition$) and a.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and a.ID = b.ORGID and b.USERID = c.ID and c.XT_ZXBZ = '0') a

insert into SYS_MESSAGE (ID,XXNR,XXLB,YWURL,FSR,FSRDM,FSSJ,FSRSSDW,FSRSSDWDM,DXZT,JSLX,JSR,JSRDM,JSRSSDW,JSRSSDWDM,SFCK,CKSJ,XXBT,DKFS) select SEQ_PK.NEXTVAL as ID,#sysMessage.xxnr# as XXNR,#sysMessage.xxlb# as XXLB,decode(#sysMessage.ywurl#,null,null,#sysMessage.ywurl# || SEQ_PK.CURRVAL) as YWURL, #sysMessage.fsr# as FSR,#sysMessage.fsrdm# as FSRDM,#sysMessage.fssj# as FSSJ,#sysMessage.fsrssdw# as FSRSSDW, #sysMessage.fsrssdwdm# as FSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.dxzt# as DXZT,#sysMessage.jslx# as JSLX, t.USERNAME as JSR,t.USERID as JSRDM,t.ORGCODE as JSRSSDW,t.ORGNAME as JSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.sfck# as SFCK,#sysMessage.cksj# as CKSJ,#sysMessage.xxbt# as XXBT,#sysMessage.dkfs# as DKFS from (select e.ORGCODE,e.ORGNAME,e.USERID,e.USERNAME from ( select d.*,rownum as ROWNO from (select distinct a.ID as ORGID,a.ORGCODE,a.ORGNAME,a.ORGTYPE,c.ID,c.USERID,c.USERNAME from (select ID,ORGCODE,ORGNAME,ORGTYPE from ORG_ORGANIZATION where XT_ZXBZ = '0' connect by prior ID = PARENTID start with ORGCODE in ($orgCodeCondition$)) a,ORG_ORG_USER b,ORG_USER c where a.ID = b.ORGID and b.USERID = c.ID and c.XT_ZXBZ = '0' order by ORGTYPE) d) e, (select min(rowno) as rowno from ( select d.*,rownum as ROWNO from (select distinct a.ID as ORGID,a.ORGCODE,a.ORGNAME,a.ORGTYPE,c.ID,c.USERID,c.USERNAME from (select ID,ORGCODE,ORGNAME,ORGTYPE from ORG_ORGANIZATION where XT_ZXBZ = '0' connect by prior ID = PARENTID start with ORGCODE in ($orgCodeCondition$)) a,ORG_ORG_USER b,ORG_USER c where a.ID = b.ORGID and b.USERID = c.ID and c.XT_ZXBZ = '0' order by ORGTYPE) d) group by USERID) f where e.ROWNO = f.ROWNO) t

insert into SYS_MESSAGE (ID,XXNR,XXLB,YWURL,FSR,FSRDM,FSSJ,FSRSSDW,FSRSSDWDM,DXZT,JSLX,JSR,JSRDM,JSRSSDW,JSRSSDWDM,SFCK,CKSJ,XXBT,DKFS) select SEQ_PK.NEXTVAL as ID,#sysMessage.xxnr# as XXNR,#sysMessage.xxlb# as XXLB,decode(#sysMessage.ywurl#,null,null,#sysMessage.ywurl# || SEQ_PK.CURRVAL) as YWURL, #sysMessage.fsr# as FSR,#sysMessage.fsrdm# as FSRDM,#sysMessage.fssj# as FSSJ,#sysMessage.fsrssdw# as FSRSSDW, #sysMessage.fsrssdwdm# as FSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.dxzt# as DXZT,#sysMessage.jslx# as JSLX, t.USERNAME as JSR,t.USERID as JSRDM,t.ORGCODE as JSRSSDW,t.ORGNAME as JSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.sfck# as SFCK,#sysMessage.cksj# as CKSJ,#sysMessage.xxbt# as XXBT,#sysMessage.dkfs# as DKFS from (select distinct a.ORGCODE,a.ORGNAME,c.USERID,c.USERNAME from ORG_ORGANIZATION a,ORG_ORG_USER b,ORG_USER org where a.ORGCODE in ($orgCodeCondition$) and a.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and a.ID = b.ORGID and b.USERID = org.ID and org.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and $orgParameterCondition$) t

insert into SYS_MESSAGE (ID,XXNR,XXLB,YWURL,FSR,FSRDM,FSSJ,FSRSSDW,FSRSSDWDM,DXZT,JSLX,JSR,JSRDM,JSRSSDW,JSRSSDWDM,SFCK,CKSJ,XXBT,DKFS) select SEQ_PK.NEXTVAL as ID,#sysMessage.xxnr# as XXNR,#sysMessage.xxlb# as XXLB,decode(#sysMessage.ywurl#,null,null,#sysMessage.ywurl# || SEQ_PK.CURRVAL) as YWURL, #sysMessage.fsr# as FSR,#sysMessage.fsrdm# as FSRDM,#sysMessage.fssj# as FSSJ,#sysMessage.fsrssdw# as FSRSSDW, #sysMessage.fsrssdwdm# as FSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.dxzt# as DXZT,#sysMessage.jslx# as JSLX, t.USERNAME as JSR,t.USERID as JSRDM,t.ORGCODE as JSRSSDW,t.ORGNAME as JSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.sfck# as SFCK,#sysMessage.cksj# as CKSJ,#sysMessage.xxbt# as XXBT,#sysMessage.dkfs# as DKFS from (select e.ORGCODE,e.ORGNAME,e.USERID,e.USERNAME from ( select d.*,rownum as ROWNO from (select distinct a.ID as ORGID,a.ORGCODE,a.ORGNAME,a.ORGTYPE,c.ID,c.USERID,c.USERNAME from (select * from (select ID,ORGCODE,ORGNAME,ORGTYPE from ORG_ORGANIZATION where XT_ZXBZ = '0' connect by prior ID = PARENTID start with ORGCODE in ($orgCodeCondition$)) org where $orgParameterCondition$) a,ORG_ORG_USER b,ORG_USER c where a.ID = b.ORGID and b.USERID = c.ID and c.XT_ZXBZ = '0' order by ORGTYPE) d) e, (select min(rowno) as rowno from ( select d.*,rownum as ROWNO from (select distinct a.ID as ORGID,a.ORGCODE,a.ORGNAME,a.ORGTYPE,c.ID,c.USERID,c.USERNAME from (select * from (select ID,ORGCODE,ORGNAME,ORGTYPE from ORG_ORGANIZATION where XT_ZXBZ = '0' connect by prior ID = PARENTID start with ORGCODE in ($orgCodeCondition$)) org where $orgParameterCondition$) a,ORG_ORG_USER b,ORG_USER c where a.ID = b.ORGID and b.USERID = c.ID and c.XT_ZXBZ = '0' order by ORGTYPE) d) group by USERID) f where e.ROWNO = f.ROWNO) t

insert into SYS_MESSAGE (ID,XXNR,XXLB,YWURL,FSR,FSRDM,FSSJ,FSRSSDW,FSRSSDWDM,DXZT,JSLX,JSR,JSRDM,JSRSSDW,JSRSSDWDM,SFCK,CKSJ,XXBT,DKFS) select SEQ_PK.NEXTVAL as ID,#sysMessage.xxnr# as XXNR,#sysMessage.xxlb# as XXLB,decode(#sysMessage.ywurl#,null,null,#sysMessage.ywurl# || SEQ_PK.CURRVAL) as YWURL, #sysMessage.fsr# as FSR,#sysMessage.fsrdm# as FSRDM,#sysMessage.fssj# as FSSJ,#sysMessage.fsrssdw# as FSRSSDW, #sysMessage.fsrssdwdm# as FSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.dxzt# as DXZT,#sysMessage.jslx# as JSLX, t.USERNAME as JSR,t.USERID as JSRDM, t.ORGNAME as JSRSSDW, t.ORGCODE as JSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.sfck# as SFCK,#sysMessage.cksj# as CKSJ,#sysMessage.xxbt# as XXBT,#sysMessage.dkfs# as DKFS from (select x.* from ( select distinct a.ID as ORGID, a.ORGCODE,a.ORGNAME,c.ID,c.USERID,c.USERNAME from ORG_ORGANIZATION a,ORG_ORG_USER b,ORG_USER c where a.ORGCODE in ($orgCodeCondition$) and a.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and a.ID = b.ORGID and b.USERID = c.ID and c.XT_ZXBZ = '0') x, ORG_POSITION d,ORG_ORG_POS e,ORG_POS_USER f where d.ID = e.POSID and d.XT_ZXBZ = '0' and e.ID = f.POSID and d.POSID in ($posIdCondition$) and x.ID = f.USERID) t

insert into SYS_MESSAGE (ID,XXNR,XXLB,YWURL,FSR,FSRDM,FSSJ,FSRSSDW,FSRSSDWDM,DXZT,JSLX,JSR,JSRDM,JSRSSDW,JSRSSDWDM,SFCK,CKSJ,XXBT,DKFS) select SEQ_PK.NEXTVAL as ID,#sysMessage.xxnr# as XXNR,#sysMessage.xxlb# as XXLB,decode(#sysMessage.ywurl#,null,null,#sysMessage.ywurl# || SEQ_PK.CURRVAL) as YWURL, #sysMessage.fsr# as FSR,#sysMessage.fsrdm# as FSRDM,#sysMessage.fssj# as FSSJ,#sysMessage.fsrssdw# as FSRSSDW, #sysMessage.fsrssdwdm# as FSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.dxzt# as DXZT,#sysMessage.jslx# as JSLX, '' as JSR,'' as JSRDM,t.ORGNAME as JSRSSDW,t.ORGCODE as JSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.sfck# as SFCK,#sysMessage.cksj# as CKSJ,#sysMessage.xxbt# as XXBT,#sysMessage.dkfs# as DKFS from (select distinct a.ORGCODE,a.ORGNAME from ORG_ORGANIZATION a where a.ORGCODE in ($orgCodeCondition$) and a.XT_ZXBZ = '0') t

insert into SYS_MESSAGE (ID,XXNR,XXLB,YWURL,FSR,FSRDM,FSSJ,FSRSSDW,FSRSSDWDM,DXZT,JSLX,JSR,JSRDM,JSRSSDW,JSRSSDWDM,SFCK,CKSJ,XXBT,DKFS) select SEQ_PK.NEXTVAL as ID,#sysMessage.xxnr# as XXNR,#sysMessage.xxlb# as XXLB,decode(#sysMessage.ywurl#,null,null,#sysMessage.ywurl# || SEQ_PK.CURRVAL) as YWURL, #sysMessage.fsr# as FSR,#sysMessage.fsrdm# as FSRDM,#sysMessage.fssj# as FSSJ,#sysMessage.fsrssdw# as FSRSSDW, #sysMessage.fsrssdwdm# as FSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.dxzt# as DXZT,#sysMessage.jslx# as JSLX, '' as JSR,'' as JSRDM,t.ORGCODE as JSRSSDW,t.ORGNAME as JSRSSDWDM, #sysMessage.sfck# as SFCK,#sysMessage.cksj# as CKSJ,#sysMessage.xxbt# as XXBT,#sysMessage.dkfs# as DKFS from (select distinct a.ORGCODE,a.ORGNAME from (select ID,ORGCODE,ORGNAME,ORGTYPE from ORG_ORGANIZATION where XT_ZXBZ = '0' connect by prior ID = PARENTID start with ORGCODE in ($orgCodeCondition$)) a) t

insert all
into SYS_MESSAGE (ID,XXNR,XXLB,YWURL,FSR,FSRDM,FSSJ,FSRSSDW,FSRSSDWDM,DXZT,JSLX,JSR,JSRDM,JSRSSDW,JSRSSDWDM,SFCK,CKSJ,XXBT) values (#list[].id#,#list[].xxnr#,#list[].xxlb#,#list[].ywurl#,#list[].fsr#,#list[].fsrdm#,#list[].fssj#,#list[].fsrssdw#,#list[].fsrssdwdm#,#list[].dxzt#, #list[].jslx#,#list[].jsr#,#list[].jsrdm#,#list[].jsrssdw#,#list[].jsrssdwdm#,#list[].sfck#,#list[].cksj#,#list[].xxbt#)
select * from dual
